#Korean #slang terms that are relevant to the current climate. Ko-seukeu (koseukeu) and teok-seukeu(teogseukeu) combine mask (maseukeu), & nose (ko) or chin (teog). These are improper ways to wear a mask, and subject to a a fine of W100,000 (approx. 91 USD)! #Korea #Learning
